Flow.description: https://watercarestp.atlassian.net/browse/MSRS-263 This flow is used to check the water on/off request. When the field crew needs to turn the water off the flow will record the time and water status. This will also create the job notes with the required fields. The water status will be updated on the Work Order as well. V15: This version is created to add two more options as extend time and Impact analysis V17- Don’t set the water off to default Water off including impact assessment will go to the same screen to populate the details Show the water status on extend time Water turned on then they should be able to turn it off and on again V28- Updated the flow as per the Miro feedback V29- The impact assessment field cannot be populated on the job notes from flow, it should be a formula field as job notes are created at each step. V30- Update the actual water on and off time to calculate the total duration water was turned off V33- version 31-33 only for beautification of label. V34- Make fields Mandatory V13- Has customer been notified is not mandatory
Flow.interviewLabel: MSN Field Service Mobile App -Water Status On/Off {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: MSN Field Service Mobile App -Water Status On/Off

fields.name: Invalidinput
fields.fieldText:
Error - Wrong job status

It looks like your Job is not in the right status in order to add work details. Your job might not be started yet or is already completed.

Please use the "Update Status" action first to confirm that you are on site.
